_Type_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

struct pgm_fecinfo_t {
        uint8_t        block_size;                /`*` RS(n) `*`/
        uint8_t        proactive_packets;
        uint8_t        group_size;                /`*` RS(k) `*`/
        bool           ondemand_parity_enabled;
        bool           var_pktlen_enabled;
        };
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Settings for forward error correction (FEC).
